byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR, DAVID M. HALBFINGER and JIM RUTENBERG
byline.contributor: Jeff Zeleny and Nicholas Confessore contributed reporting.

snippet: In the wake of a relentless courtship by Republicans, advisers to Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey are considering whether they could set up effective political operations in Iowa and New Hampshire.
lead_paragraph: In the wake of a relentless courtship by Republicans, advisers to Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey are considering whether they could set up effective political operations in Iowa and New Hampshire.

headline.main: Christie Team Assessing How Fast a 2012 Campaign Could Be Mounted
headline.print_headline: Pressed, Christie Team Checks Logistics of Joining 2012 Race
headline.seo: Christie Team Assessing How Fast a 2012 Campaign Could Be Mounted
